name: ID
definition: the ID allocated to the specific SAA

name: NAME
definition: the name used to identify the SAA

name: FUND
definition: the short name used to idenfity the fund for the SAA

name: APPLY_DATE
definition: the beginning date for applying the SAA

name: IS_IMPLEMENTATION_SCHEDULE
definition: whether the SAA is the LT SAA or not, default should be false

name: IS_LEGACY_SAA
definition: whether the SAA is a legacy SAA, default should be false

name: IS_TEST_SAA
definition: whether the SAA is under testing, used for dev environments, default should be false

name: WDV_ID
definition: the ID of the SAA in the WDV access database

name: TEST_APPLY_DATE
definition: the beginning date for applying the SAA in dev environment
